name: Zen - Lost Soul
description: Zen is an Alternative Rock band that originated in Yerevan, Armenia. The members of the band are: Eliza Barkhudaryan(Vocals and Violin), Hrach Amirkhanyan(Drums), Ani Ulbricht(Bass Guitar), David Hovhannisyan(Guitar). The songLost Soul is written and composed by Eliza Barkhudaryan.
